Get the list of pull requests queued in each merge queue of a partition

schema.title: Response Repository Partition Branch Repos  Owner   Repository  Partition  Partition Name  Branch  Branch Name  Get

partitions.title: Partitions
partitions.description: A dictionary containing partition names as keys and, as a value of those key, the list of pull requests queued in the partition. If partition are not used in this repository, the default partition name used will be `__default__`.

check_type.title: Check Type
check_type.description: The type of queue check (in_place or draft_pr)

pull_request_number.title: Pull Request Number
pull_request_number.description: The number of the pull request used by the speculative check

started_at.title: Started At
started_at.description: The timestamp when the checks have started for this pull request

ended_at.title: Ended At
ended_at.description: The timestamp when the checks have ended for this pull request

state.title: State
state.description: The global state of the checks

metadata.description: The number of items in this page
The number of items per page

pull_requests.title: Pull Requests
pull_requests.description: The pull requests queued in this partition

pull_requests.title: Pull Requests
pull_requests.description: The pull requests in this queue

PR_AHEAD_DEQUEUED.title: Pr Ahead Dequeued
PR_AHEAD_DEQUEUED.description: A pull request ahead in the queue has been dequeued.

PR_AHEAD_FAILED_TO_MERGE.title: Pr Ahead Failed To Merge
PR_AHEAD_FAILED_TO_MERGE.description: A pull request ahead in the queue failed to get merged.

PR_WITH_HIGHER_PRIORITY_QUEUED.title: Pr With Higher Priority Queued
PR_WITH_HIGHER_PRIORITY_QUEUED.description: A pull request with a higher priority has been queued.

PR_QUEUED_TWICE.title: Pr Queued Twice
PR_QUEUED_TWICE.description: A pull request was queued twice.

SPECULATIVE_CHECK_NUMBER_REDUCED.title: Speculative Check Number Reduced
SPECULATIVE_CHECK_NUMBER_REDUCED.description: The number of speculative checks, in the queue rules, has been reduced.

CHECKS_TIMEOUT.title: Checks Timeout
CHECKS_TIMEOUT.description: The checks for the queued pull request have timed out.

CHECKS_FAILED.title: Checks Failed
CHECKS_FAILED.description: The checks for the queued pull request have failed.

QUEUE_RULE_MISSING.title: Queue Rule Missing
QUEUE_RULE_MISSING.description: The queue rules are missing because of a configuration change.

PR_FROZEN_NO_CASCADING.title: Pr Frozen No Cascading
PR_FROZEN_NO_CASCADING.description: A pull request has been freezed because of a queue freeze with cascading effect disabled.

BASE_BRANCH_CHANGED.title: Base Branch Changed
BASE_BRANCH_CHANGED.description: The pull request base branch has changed

BASE_BRANCH_MISSING.title: Base Branch Missing
BASE_BRANCH_MISSING.description: The base branch does not exist anymore

TARGET_BRANCH_CHANGED.title: Target Branch Changed
TARGET_BRANCH_CHANGED.description: The pull request target branch has changed (This value is deprecated use BASE_BRANCH_CHANGED instead)

TARGET_BRANCH_MISSING.title: Target Branch Missing
TARGET_BRANCH_MISSING.description: The target branch does not exist anymore (This value is deprecated use BASE_BRANCH_MISSING instead)

PR_UNEXPECTEDLY_FAILED_TO_MERGE.title: Pr Unexpectedly Failed To Merge
PR_UNEXPECTEDLY_FAILED_TO_MERGE.description: Pull request unexpectedly failed to get merged

BATCH_MAX_FAILURE_RESOLUTION_ATTEMPTS.title: Batch Max Failure Resolution Attempts
BATCH_MAX_FAILURE_RESOLUTION_ATTEMPTS.description: The maximum batch failure resolution attempts has been reached

PR_CHECKS_STOPPED_BECAUSE_MERGE_QUEUE_PA.title: Pr Checks Stopped Because Merge Queue Pause
PR_CHECKS_STOPPED_BECAUSE_MERGE_QUEUE_PA.description: The checks have been interrupted because the merge queue is paused on this repository

CONFLICT_WITH_BASE_BRANCH.title: Conflict With Base Branch
CONFLICT_WITH_BASE_BRANCH.description: The pull request conflicts with the base branch

CONFLICT_WITH_PULL_AHEAD.title: Conflict With Pull Ahead
CONFLICT_WITH_PULL_AHEAD.description: The pull request conflicts with at least one pull request ahead in queue

BRANCH_UPDATE_FAILED.title: Branch Update Failed
BRANCH_UPDATE_FAILED.description: The pull request can't be updated for security reasons

DRAFT_PULL_REQUEST_CHANGED.title: Draft Pull Request Changed
DRAFT_PULL_REQUEST_CHANGED.description: The draft pull request has been unexpectedly changed

PULL_REQUEST_UPDATED.title: Pull Request Updated
PULL_REQUEST_UPDATED.description: The pull request has been unexpectedly updated

MERGE_QUEUE_RESET.title: Merge Queue Reset
MERGE_QUEUE_RESET.description: The merge queue has been reset

partition_name.title: Partition Name
partition_name.description: The name of the partition, if no partition are used the partition name will be `__default__`

queues.title: Queues
queues.description: The checks outcomes data for each queue in the current partition

queue_checks_outcome.description: The checks outcomes data for the partition's queue

reason.title: Reason

cascading.description: The active status of the cascading effect
